answers.answer: HiIm currently taking p 17 shots and had a cerclage put in at 12 weeks. The earlier the cerclage gets put in, the better. I have had 2 looses at 20 wks. And by the grace of god ill be 31 weeks on Monday. At first I was scared but it has really brought me far ;) I think it's great.

I had a cerclage @ 23 wks & am now 29. It was the best decision I could hav made. R u on bed rest?? If not, take it ez. I was able 2 return 2 my desk job after a wk of bed rest w/no prolonged standing or heavy lifting. Stay positive & rest up!! Good luck!!
Thank you i was a lot nervous at first but im okay now!
Yes im on bedrest.... my dr told me to take it really easy and he told me i was going to have a boring pregnancy... but I made 21 weeks today so its going pretty well so far.!

21 wks?? Wow!! U hav a long way 2 go. Stock up on Netflix & reading material!! Yr doc was right, it's gonna b a long boring pregnancy, Vito.ce yr baby gets here it'll all b worth it. I wish u the best!!!

I have ic and had a cerclage at 23 weeks. I am almost 29 weeks. I also have gestational diabetes and looks like pre eclampsia is trying to set in. On top of all that heartburn really bad n my energy level is low. Sorry to sound like a Whitney butt. This is my second n last baby.

question: Well after my first loss due to IC I had to get a cerclage... I am 20+4 and got it placed about a week ago. I also have to take p17 shots until I reach 36 weeks... Have any of you had or have a cerclage or taken the p17 shots.? What are your thoughts.?
title: cerclage and p17 shots
